mapper.select:
select * from MA_CONFIG_TABLE_TEST_HIST a
a.FOGUID = #FOGUID#
and a.CONDITIONNAME = #CONDITIONNAME#
and a.USERGUID = #USERGUID#
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MA_CONFIG_TABLE_TEST_HIST A USING (SELECT #FOGUID# AS FOGUID, #USERGUID# AS USERGUID, #CONDITIONNAME# AS CONDITIONNAME FROM DUAL) B ON (A.FOGUID = B.FOGUID AND A.USERGUID = B.USERGUID AND A.CONDITIONNAME = B.CONDITIONNAME) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.CONDITIONS = #CONDITIONS# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (GUID, FOGUID, USERGUID, CONDITIONNAME, CONDITIONS) VALUES (#GUID#, #FOGUID#, #USERGUID#, #CONDITIONNAME#, #CONDITIONS#)
